Introduction
• “Qualitative reasoning is the area of AI which creates 
representations for continuous aspects of the world, 
such as space, time, and quantity, which support 
reasoning with very little information” [1]
• “People draw useful and subtle conclusions about the 
physical world without differential equations.” [1]
4
OEG Oct 2010
speaker: SYSTEM
